IEEE Draft Standard for Local and Metropolitan Area Networks -- Virtual Bridged Local Area Networks Amendment: Multiple I-SID Registration Protocol
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE P802.1Qbe/D1.6_August 2010 (Draft Amendment to IEEE Std 802.1Q-2005)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard specifies protocols, procedures, and managed objects to support topology change signaling to alter the binding (held in an I-Component) of Customer addresses to Backbone addresses on a per-I-SID basis. This is accomplished by extending the use of the Multiple Registration Protocol (MRP).
